channel.title: Downloading videos from Youtube
channel.description: Well I used the movie downloaders to get the .flv file onto my computer. However I don't know how to take the movie and use a movie editor to only keep the music. If anyone knows how to do this and has suggestions in which movie editors I should use please post here. Thanks.

item.title: Downloading videos from Youtube
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“xxhellfirexx, post:4, topic:40110”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=56214.msg696147#msg696147 date=1167294230]

Take a look at the VideoDownloader extension for firefox

https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/2390/
[/quote]

Okay I had now got the videos downloaded and playing on my computer. A friend of mine told me to get a computer audio input recorder. However, does anyone have any program suggestions to which would do the task best?[/quote]
Find the name of the song, download it. Simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading videos from Youtube
item.dc:creator: @xxhellfirexx xxhellfirexx
item.description:
@xxhellfirexx wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:3, topic:40110”][quote author=BobDole81 link=topic=56214.msg696118#msg696118 date=1167293925]
Take a look at the VideoDownloader extension for firefox
[/quote]
https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/2390/[/quote]

Okay I had now got the videos downloaded and playing on my computer. A friend of mine told me to get a computer audio input recorder. However, does anyone have any program suggestions to which would do the task best?
